So all in all it works, I've even seen the Mexicans invade by sea with a navy... nice, this is the only thing I cared about in this update. Realistic now :)

Crashes on a clean razor1911 install when starting a campaign. Any ideas??

"Extract the files in a separate folder and replace carefully each ( 1 by 1 ) (careful with the campaigns directory) "

Um, what do you mean by replace each one carefully with the (1 by 1)? I don't understand what you mean.

What he means by "Extract the files in a separate folder and replace carefully each ( 1 by 1 ) (careful with the campaigns directory)"
is to
1.Extract the Archive(Meaning this DL)
2 Go to Folder where to extract it
3.Press Setup
4 Change the Intallation Path to anywhere other than where you put your game
5.Go to the path where you intall the update
6 You can see Folders/Files there
7.Carefully copy the Folder/Files to your game.

Now thats what he Meant by "Extract the files in a separate folder and replace carefully each ( 1 by 1 ) (careful with the campaigns directory)"

Hope this helps.
